# Test that the quickfix window gets populated with error messages from gopls

vim ex 'e main.go'
sleep 2000ms
vim ex 'GOVIMUpdateQuickfix'
vim ex 'copen'
vim expr 'getline(0, \"$\")'
cmp stdout errors.golden

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

-- main.go --
package main

import "fmt"

func main() {
	fmt.Printf("This is a test %v\n")
}
-- errors.golden --
[
  "main.go|6 col 2| Printf format %v reads arg #1, but call has 0 args"
]
